meta.desc: Fixing the "using UI library" workflow with building icon fonts from atomic SVG icons. The library has its own flow, and obviously the new things can only appear in new versions. However the library customers sometimes cannot wait even an hour. With the atomic builds you can easily provide library customer with the freedom to modify everything. Even icon fonts.
